name: Bit Hub
description:
BitHub is a game developed by industry leading team of professional game developers. But something went wrong. Now the only way to play this game, is by Rewinding across commits (previous versions of the game), to find points in time, where features like jumping were actually working. Good luck, you'll need it!

Controls:
"A", "D" - move left or right
"Spacebar" - Jump (if it works)
